https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/specs/altair/light-client/full-node.md lists several features as SHOULD. Is there a list of (full node) clients that actually implement this behaviour?)

author: dirkjaeckel
content:
What does SHOULD exactly mean? That a feature is optional, right? Even if the developers implement it although they don't have to. What if users demand to be able to disable these optional features? 

Will a client be able to claim it is Altair compliant without implementing these features?

author: dirkjaeckel
content: And even more importantly: As a light client can I select contacting only nodes that implement this? Or do I have to try and if they don't drop the connection and try to find one that does? How does this work with optional features?
